argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplval.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplval.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | mplval.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | mplval.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mplbas.u | |- U = ( Base ` P ) |
| 6 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( f = X -> ( f finSupp .0. <-> X finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mplbas | |- U = { f e. B | f finSupp .0. } |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( X e. U <-> ( X e. B /\ X finSupp .0. ) ) |
